title: Burst tires: Goodyear's maneuvers to avoid a scandal
summary: 'The Goodyear affair' (3/4). During the 2010s, the manufacturer discreetly compensated dozens of accident victims, while demanding their silence. But Sophie Rollet, the widow of a truck driver who died in a 2014 accident provoked by a defective tire, was convinced that the multinational was responsible, and kept investigating.
